_header: He that this book wrote his soul whet
Subjects: prayers, asked on behalf of scribes
_description: Prayer for the scribe — one couplet

HunHM139.Transcription:
He that thys booke wrott hys sole wetteto hevin orgy it was
                    hett
HunHM139.Note:
Added to originally blank column by a hand of the sixteenth
                    century.
